page.title: 07The Village Policeman
page.content: The first real{Village policeman}was appointed in 1840, before this a man was chosen for one year.The Village policeman now lives down Fingrith Hall Lane,{Blackmore},in the{Police House which was built in 1950.The present policeman weighs 19 stone and is 6ft,6ins and is 36 years old.At the beginning of the day he works an hour in the office then he does his beat and sees{people}about inquiries.He has a beat around Blackmore and he goes to Nine Ashes,Hook End and Doddinghurst. He works 8 hours a day and sometimes more.He has an{Austin Rover}which they called a{beat car}and inside he has got a VHS radio controlled at police HQ Chelmsford.He has also got a small {VHF radio}which he uses when he is not in his beat car.
